title: Sketchbook, "Sketchbook  - Funny Garbage Design", 1998
inscribed: In black ink, at upper right of first page: 9.5.98
provenance: Note: This is Peter Girardi's sketchbook, produced in his capacity as a Funny Garbage designer.  The gift offer is from the firm, Funny Garbage.
description: 93 leaves with text, exploratory sketches of various styles of letter forms, abstract sketches,  some scrap fragments and cards affixed to  several pages, plus loose inserts (announcement cards etc. - see itemization below).  On sketchbook  front cover: four Pokemon(? - i.e. alien costumed figures) cards; adhered to back cover, green spill shape, "Power Puff Girls" purple sticker, blank comic "balloon" for text, red circle with yellow and black rippling border,  white letterforms against black.   Adhered to front inside cover: lots of "Funny Garbage" stickers,  a Mr. Magoo sticker, fragments of Peter Girardi's American Express and Visa credit cards, snake stickers, etc.  On page 1, text written all over page, at upper right: REMOVE FORMALITY.... On page 2, hand-printed text begins:  SCIENCE IS HUGE.... JET LAGGER.  On page 3, hand-printed text begins: TACIT KNOWLEDGE....   List of inserts between front cover and 1st page:  a) Seenworld card; b) Stefan Sagmeister FIT lecture announcement "Things to do before I die... touch somebody's heart with Graphic Design"; c)Graf Core paper flyer.  Inserts between back cover and last page: d)in yellow translucent envelope, "Welcome to Amazon.com Toys" card; e) loose sketchbook page, inscribed in LR corner (recto)m :Knowledge Garden/Tree of Knowledge...".  Inserted between pages within book:f) Delta Airlines form "Live Animals checklist"; g) pink ticket "2331"; h) torn towlette packet fragment; i) Funny Garbage sticker.

exhibitions.title: IDEO Selects: Works from the Permanent Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook, "Sketchbook  - Funny Garbage Design", 1998.
1998. Ink, gouache, with mixed media. Gift of Funny Garbage. 2000-56-2-1/93.
